content.json:
# DORA to NIST Control Mapping for Security Alerts

| **Alert Type / Keyword**                         | **Mapped DORA Article**                        | **NIST Control (Reference)**    |
|--------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|
| Credential Access / Brute Force                  | Art. 11 (Detection & Response)                 | PR.AC-1, PR.AC-4               |
| Malware / Virus / Ransomware                     | Art. 10 (ICT Risk Mitigation)                  | PR.IP-9, DE.CM-4               |
| Data Exfiltration / Leak                         | Art. 11 (Data Protection)                      | PR.DS-1                        |
| Service Outage / Availability                    | Art. 12 (Continuity)                           | PR.PT-5, RS.RP-1               |
| Backup Failure                                   | Art. 13 (Recovery & Resilience)                | PR.IP-4                        |
| Unauthorized Access                              | Art. 10 (ICT Risk Controls)                    | PR.AC-6                        |
| Privilege Escalation                             | Art. 7 (Risk Management)                       | PR.AC-5                        |
| Lateral Movement / Remote Code Execution         | Art. 10 (Threat Response)                      | DE.CM-7                        |
| Suspicious Login / MFA Bypass                    | Art. 11 (Access Monitoring)                    | PR.AC-7                        |
| Threat Intelligence Match                        | Art. 20 (Threat Intel)                         | DE.CM-1                        |
| Data Connector Failure                           | Art. 6 (Governance & Control)                  | ID.BE-5                        |
| DR Test Failure                                  | Art. 15 (Continuity Testing)                   | RS.IM-1                        |
| Incident Closure / Reporting                     | Art. 25 (Reporting to Authorities)             | RS.CO-5                        |
| TI Feed Activity / IOC Hits                      | Art. 18 & 20 (Information Sharing & TI)        | DE.CM-1                        |
| Vulnerability Exploitation / CVE Match           | Art. 8 (Risk Identification)                   | ID.RA-1                        |
| Configuration Change / Policy Update             | Art. 6 (Governance)                            | ID.GV-2                        |
| Third-Party Service Alert                        | Art. 16 (Outsourcing Risk)                     | ID.SC-4                        |
| Attack Simulation or TLPT                        | Art. 19 (TLPT Readiness)                       | RS.IM-2                        |
| Critical System Unavailable                      | Art. 12 (Operational Continuity)               | PR.PT-5                        |
| Compliance Violation Alert                       | Art. 24 (Audit Evidence)                       | ID.GV-3                        |

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| extend ControlMapping = case(
    AlertName has_any ("Credential Access", "Brute Force", "Password Spray"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.AC-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Data Exfiltration", "Data Leak"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.DS-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Malware", "Ransomware", "Trojan"), "DORA-ART10 / NIST PR.IP-9",
    AlertName has_any ("Unauthorized Access", "Privilege Escalation"), "DORA-ART10 / NIST PR.AC-6",
    AlertName has_any ("Service Outage", "System Down", "Unreachable"), "DORA-ART12 / NIST PR.PT-5",
    AlertName has_any ("Backup Failure", "Restore Failed"), "DORA-ART13 / NIST PR.IP-4",
    AlertName has_any ("Threat Intelligence", "IOC Match", "Indicator Hit"), "DORA-ART20 / NIST DE.CM-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Suspicious Login", "MFA Bypass"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.AC-7",
    AlertName has_any ("Policy Change", "Configuration Change"), "DORA-ART6 / NIST ID.GV-2",
    AlertName has_any ("Vulnerability Exploitation", "CVE"), "DORA-ART8 / NIST ID.RA-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Third-Party", "External Vendor"), "DORA-ART16 / NIST ID.SC-4",
    AlertName has_any ("TLPT", "Pen Test", "Simulation"), "DORA-ART19 / NIST RS.IM-2",
    AlertName has_any ("Compliance Violation", "Audit"), "DORA-ART24 / NIST ID.GV-3",
    AlertName has_any ("Incident Reported", "Notification Sent"), "DORA-ART25 / NIST RS.CO-5",
    "Unmapped / Not Applicable"
)
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ControlMapping 
| order by AlertCount desc
content.title: Alerts per compliance control mapping

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize Incidents = count(), Closed = countif(Status == "Closed"), Active = countif(Status != "Closed") by bin(TimeGenerated, 30d)
content.title: Monthly Compliance Summary

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
|extend ThreatType = tostring(Data.indicator_types[0])
| extend DORA_Mapping = case(
    ThreatType has_any ("Malware","Variant"), "DORA-ART9 / NIST PR.IP-9",
    ThreatType has "Phishing", "DORA-ART10 / NIST DE.CM-1",
    ThreatType has_any ("C2", "Botnet", "CommandAndControl"), "DORA-ART10 / NIST DE.CM-7",
    ThreatType has_any ("Vulnerability", "Exploit"), "DORA-ART8 / NIST ID.RA-1",
    ThreatType has_any ("SuspiciousDomain", "MaliciousURL","malicious-activity"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST DE.CM-8",
    ThreatType has_any ("ThreatIntel", "APT", "Campaign"), "DORA-ART20 / NIST DE.CM-1",
    "Unmapped"
)
| summarize IndicatorCount = count() by DORA_Mapping , ThreatType
|where isnotempty(ThreatType)
| order by IndicatorCount desc
content.title: DORA Mapping by Threat Type present in Threat Intel Report

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| extend ControlMapping = case(
    AlertName has_any ("Credential Access", "Brute Force", "Password Spray"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.AC-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Data Exfiltration", "Data Leak"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.DS-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Malware", "Ransomware", "Trojan"), "DORA-ART10 / NIST PR.IP-9",
    AlertName has_any ("Unauthorized Access", "Privilege Escalation"), "DORA-ART10 / NIST PR.AC-6",
    AlertName has_any ("Service Outage", "System Down", "Unreachable"), "DORA-ART12 / NIST PR.PT-5",
    AlertName has_any ("Backup Failure", "Restore Failed"), "DORA-ART13 / NIST PR.IP-4",
    AlertName has_any ("Threat Intelligence", "IOC Match", "Indicator Hit"), "DORA-ART20 / NIST DE.CM-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Suspicious Login", "MFA Bypass"), "DORA-ART11 / NIST PR.AC-7",
    AlertName has_any ("Policy Change", "Configuration Change"), "DORA-ART6 / NIST ID.GV-2",
    AlertName has_any ("Vulnerability Exploitation", "CVE"), "DORA-ART8 / NIST ID.RA-1",
    AlertName has_any ("Third-Party", "External Vendor"), "DORA-ART16 / NIST ID.SC-4",
    AlertName has_any ("TLPT", "Pen Test", "Simulation"), "DORA-ART19 / NIST RS.IM-2",
    AlertName has_any ("Compliance Violation", "Audit"), "DORA-ART24 / NIST ID.GV-3",
    AlertName has_any ("Incident Reported", "Notification Sent"), "DORA-ART25 / NIST RS.CO-5",
    "Unmapped / Not Applicable"
)
|where ControlMapping != "Unmapped / Not Applicable"
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ControlMapping , AlertName , Tactics ,Techniques , AlertLink
| order by AlertCount desc
content.title: Mapping Alerts to Regulatory Controls

content.query:
Heartbeat
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend TimeSinceLast = datetime_diff('minute', now(), LastHeartbeat)
| where TimeSinceLast > 10
| project Computer, LastHeartbeat, TimeSinceLast
content.title: Inactive servers/devices

content.query:
Event
| where EventID in (1001, 1069, 1205) or EventLevelName == "Error"
| where RenderedDescription has_any ("failover", "cluster", "replica", "recovery")
| extend Action = iff(RenderedDescription contains "failover" ,"Failover", iff(RenderedDescription contains "cluster","Cluster",iff(RenderedDescription contains "replica" ,"Replica",iff(RenderedDescription contains "recovery","Recovery","Null"))))
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Computer ,Action
content.title: Trend of failover, cluster switch, or backup site activation

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
|where ObservableKey contains "network-traffic"
| join kind=innerunique (
    DeviceNetworkEvents
    | extend NetworkIP = RemoteIP
) on $left.ObservableValue == $right.NetworkIP
| project TimeGenerated, Id, Pattern ,NetworkIP, DeviceName, ActionType
content.title: Active Threat Indicators (IOC Hits) (which endpoints communicated with IOC IPs)

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize AlertCount = count() by Tactics
content.title: Alerts by MITRE ATT&CK Techniques

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName has_any ("Blocked", "Prevented")
| summarize PreventedCount = count() by ProductName
content.title: Failed Attack Attempts (Prevented by Control)

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
|where ObservableKey contains "file:hashes.'SHA-256"
| join kind=inner (DeviceFileEvents) on $left.ObservableValue == $right.SHA256
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessFileName, FileName, ObservableValue, Pattern
content.title: Malicious File or URL Detection

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where Confidence > 80
| summarize HighConfidenceCount = count() by Pattern,Confidence
| order by Confidence desc
content.title: Focus on indicators with high confidence and activity

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Status == "Closed"
| extend Duration = datetime_diff('hour', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)
| summarize Avg_MTTR_Hours = avg(Duration)
content.title: Mean Time to Resolve (MTTR)

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize Count = count() by Severity
| order by Count desc
content.title: Incidents by Severity

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Status != "Closed"
| summarize OpenCount = count() by tostring(Owner)
| order by OpenCount desc
content.title: Open Incidents by Owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| project IncidentNumber ,  Title , Tactics_Category = AdditionalData.tactics
|mv-expand Tactics_Category
|summarize No_Of_Incidents = count() by tostring(Tactics_Category)
|sort by No_Of_Incidents
content.title: Top Incident Categories

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Status == "Closed"
| extend Duration = datetime_diff('hour', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber , Title , CreatedTime , ClosedTime , Duration
|project IncidentNumber , Title , CreatedTime , ClosedTime , Duration
| sort by Duration
content.title: Time taken to resolve the incidents

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Status != "Closed"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| extend Age_Hours = datetime_diff('hour', now(), CreatedTime)
| where Age_Hours > 72
| order by Age_Hours desc
|project IncidentNumber, Title, Status , ProviderName, IncidentUrl , CreatedTime
content.title: SLA Breach â€“ Incidents Unresolved Beyond 72 Hours
